Lady Bronco Volleyball Update from Coach Hoffman:

The Lady Broncos swept Sterling City yesterday evening. Both JV and Varsity teams won in 2 and 3 sets, respectively.

JV's Jojo Dooley was strong from the service line in yesterday's match---putting the girls out in front early on. The rest of the team worked well together on both defensive and offensive ends to make quick work of their opponents and claim a VICTORY!!

The Varsity squad extended their winning streak to 5 as well. A quick ball termination from Kaylyn Hoffman--assist Skylar Harris, Reception Clarissa Rodriguez---set the tone for the match. The Lady Broncos did a good job controlling the tempo of the game for the vast majority of its duration. The team capitalized on free ball plays, turning them into multiple solid connections and quick terminations. This was a FULL GROUP EFFORT!!! The girls host Harper on Friday and are 6-2 on the season.

Please congratulate the volleyball players in passing. We are so proud of their relentless efforts and commitment!
